scripts.bootstrap: lerna bootstrap && npm run build:components:react && npm run build:components:odata && npm run git-ignore-config && sudo npm run append-hosts
scripts.start: ./scripts/pre-start-warning.sh && lerna exec --ignore ui-tests --ignore @kyma-project/* --parallel -- npm run start:kyma
scripts.start:api: lerna exec --ignore ui-tests --ignore @kyma-project/* --parallel -- npm run start:kyma:api
scripts.git-ignore-config: git update-index --assume-unchanged core/src/assets/config/config.js lambda/src/assets/config/config.js catalog/public/config/config.js instances/public/config/config.js brokers/public/config/config.js content/public/config/config.js logging/src/assets/config/config.js add-ons/public/config/config.js
scripts.append-host: grep -qF '127.0.0.1 console-dev.kyma.local' '/etc/hosts' || (echo 'append: 127.0.0.1 console-dev.kyma.local >> /etc/hosts' && echo '127.0.0.1 console-dev.kyma.local' | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts > /dev/null)
scripts.append-host-ui-test: sudo sed -i '' "/ui-test-exposed-api.kyma.local/d" '/etc/hosts' && (echo 'append: $(minikube ip) ui-test-exposed-api.kyma.local >> /etc/hosts' && echo $(minikube ip) ui-test-exposed-api.kyma.local | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts > /dev/null)
scripts.append-hosts: npm run append-host && npm run append-host-ui-test
